Our case study & projects

Learning App

Lentera Kita

An Islamic digital learning platform that can be accessed by mobile from anywhere.

Conservation App

Kalaweit

Kalaweit is a French association that works to protect biodiversity in Indonesia: saving animals, protecting forests.

Healthy App

BOKIA

Online version of Mother & Child Health Book for pregnant women, used by information & media for recording fetal & children's growth.
